Cheetah Typer

Cheetah Typer is a game that allows players to work on their typing speed in a fun way. Each level of this game will have a paragraph for the player to type, and a certain amount of time allotted to finish typing that paragraph. If the player successfully completes the paragraph prior to time running out, the player will move on to the next level.
